cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 40, Commission to Study and Develop Reparation Proposals for African Americans Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 2 (Monday, January 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. JACKSON LEE:
H.R. 40.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to Section 5 of the Fourteenth Amendment to the
United States Constitution, Congress shall have the power to
enact appropriate laws protecting the civil rights of all
Americans.
[Page H52]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 25 - 17.

policyArea.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues
